text: Kaya tyanna paya aheta, jya adhare te calata asaveta, kinva tyanna hata aheta, jyadvare ekhadya vastula dharu sakatila, kinva tyanna dole aheta, jyadvare te pahata asaveta, kinva tyanna kana aheta, jyadvare te aikatata. Tumhi sanga, tumhi apalya sarva sahabhagyanna bolavuna ghya, maga mala (hani pohacavinyaci) upayayojana kara. Maga mala kincitahi savada de'u naka
